title: Router: Artifacts + publish contracts
description: Routes packaging/publishing intents through artifact manifests and verification gates, then emits publish plan for approval.

content.mermaid:
flowchart TD
  U[User intent: package/publish] --> A[pack.artifacts.manifest.baseline.v1]
  A --> G{Gates satisfied?}
  G -->|yes| P[pack.package.publish.contract_first.neutral.v1]
  G -->|WAIT_USER| W[WAIT_USER]
  P --> Done[Done]
  W --> P
  P -->|fail| D[pack.diagnose.unstoppable.v1]
  D --> Done
